org.pikater.shared.database

Class EntityManagerInstancesCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.shared.database.EntityManagerInstancesCreator

  • public class EntityManagerInstancesCreator
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory primaryFactory
      EntityManagerFactory instantiation takes some time so it's best to use a single instance to produce EntityManager instances, unless we need several different configurations for various purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityManagerInstancesCreator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManagerInstance()
      Produced instances of EntityManager use the same configuration as the parental EntityManagerFactory instance.
      static void testDatabaseConnectionWorkingProperly()
      Makes a default database call from information provided in the "persistence.xml" file.

        EntityManagerFactory instantiation takes some time so it's best to use a single instance to produce EntityManager instances, unless we need several different configurations for various purposes.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManagerInstance

        public static javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManagerInstance()
        Produced instances of EntityManager use the same configuration as the parental EntityManagerFactory instance.
        See Also:
        ./src/META-INF/persistence.xml

      • testDatabaseConnectionWorkingProperly

        public static void testDatabaseConnectionWorkingProperly()
                                                  throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Makes a default database call from information provided in the "persistence.xml" file.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If the database address provided in "persistence.xml" could not be resolved. Check internet connection on both machines, firewall settings, etc...
        IMPORTANT NOTE: this behaviour might be specific to PostGre.
